xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/44817-Bullets, Blood & a Fistful of Ca$h 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pNxRxe2wXthIooyzg9GwjVKoLha.jpg A hard boiled tale of bloody revenge that interweaves the stories of nine criminals. The story takes place in one day, on the eve of an all out syndicate war. Through a twisted series of events, the interweaving narratives are put on an ultra-violent collision course that will determine, once and for all, who owns the streets. Bullets, Blood & a Fistful of Ca$h
